events.message: Customer reported a car collision incident that occurred last night at an intersection downtown.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident based on information about the vehicle and collision details.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to manage the investigation and assist the customer.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim was acknowledged and is being processed.
The customer was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report from the accident.
All requested documents, including pictures and the official police report, were submitted by the customer timely.
Investigation into the vehicle damage and accident circumstances began with review of submitted evidence.
The investigation team concluded the inquiry and verified that the collision caused the damage claimed.
A settlement offer covering damages and repairs was proposed to the customer for their review.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the overall claims process so far.
Claim approval was finalized after customer agreement, confirming that compensation will be processed next.
The payment for the approved auto accident claim was issued and transferred to the customer's account.
The claim was officially closed with no outstanding issues after successful payment and customer confirmation.
All claim files and documentation were archived for record keeping and future reference if needed.
